post.author: Sabooya
post.body:
Teaser Video
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KVCtnLMj3SY

This multiplayer map was based of Phrantic and Never Outgunned, the Swelt maps from Doom 3. We tried to give doom more of a quake feel as well. Expect more maps from us soon.

Instalation:
Download the file here.
http://www.exg-clan.com/web/index.php?s ... es&file=19
http://www.fileplanet.com/178555/170000 ... ranticised
Requires Doom 3 of course, and extract the zip's containing files to your doom 3 base.

post.author: vinnie_jones
post.body: so this mp only or what?

post.author: Sabooya
post.body: yes it it multiplayer, i fixed description to match.

post.author: Marineofuac
post.body:
sabooya PWNS!!!! LEEEEET!!!

should have put that airplane model in a easter egg room, that would have pwned ROFL

post.author: PrimeviL
post.body:
Hey, very good map Sabooya !
I can't wait for others multimaps (1 & 2).
